org.apache.hadoop.crypto

Class CipherOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CipherOption

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class CipherOption
extends Object
    Used between client and server to negotiate the cipher suite, key and iv.
